```{r}
library(readr)

data <- read_delim("../data/ROW.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, locale = locale(decimal_mark = ",", 
       grouping_mark = "."), trim_ws = TRUE)
cols(
  `Ad group` = col_character(),
  `Max, CPC` = col_double(),
  Clicks = col_integer(),
  Impressions = col_integer(),
  `CTR%` = col_double(),
  `Avg,CPC` = col_double(),
  Costo = col_double(),
  `Avg,Posicion` = col_double(),
  Qscore = col_character(),
  Ventas = col_integer(),
  `Cost,conv` = col_double(),
  `Conv, rate%` = col_double(),
  `All conv` = col_integer()
)
```
